alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 8:50PM CDT until March 25 at 7:51PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek At Laurel. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover Old Sandersville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 15.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 7.2 Mon 7 pm CDT 8.8 14.2 14.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 900 AM CDT.
